WorkflowInfo.Name: Return number of lines in a text file
WorkflowInfo.Description: Return number of lines in a text file
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process counts the number of lines in a specific file and sends the results be email. It can be used to know if a log file has any information in it besides the title/time, or if it has grown since the last check.
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ReadFile;Assembly=ReadFile, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:ReadFile IsValid="True" x:Name="readFile1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" ReadingDirection="Top" DisplayName="Read File" Path="c:\log.txt" LinesToRead="" Password="" LineFilter="" Description="Read the file in the specified path." HostId="1" TypeName="ReadFile" UserName="" /><ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" ResultSet="%readFile1%" ResultSetName="readFile1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><ns2:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Rows number on c:\log.txt is %getRowsCount1%" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail1" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY><PRE><PRE><FONT face=Arial>Rows number on c:\log.txt is %getRowsCount1%</FONT></PRE></PRE></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
